Text:
Thank you so much for providing these. It's been great to be able to travel and not miss any racing.

Will you be doing this next season as well?

I do plan on capping next seasons F1 & MotoGP for anyone who wants them again, I have decided to upload the torrents to Mininova as well from now on as the 'database error' here on TPB was very frustrasting...
Thanks a lot man. I hope you do it next season too.
